definitions.meaning_cn: 被期望做某事，通常表示责任或预测

examples.en: Employees are expected to arrive on time for meetings.
examples.cn: 员工应准时参加会议。

examples.en: The project is expected to be completed by next month.
examples.cn: 该项目预计下个月完成。

examples.en: She is expected to win the election based on recent polls.
examples.cn: 根据最近的民调，她很可能赢得选举。

examples.en: Rain is expected to start in the afternoon.
examples.cn: 预计下午会开始下雨。

examples.en: Why don't you come along to the party with us?
examples.cn: 你为什么不和我们一起来参加派对？

examples.en: He decided to come along on the hiking trip.
examples.cn: 他决定一起来参加徒步旅行。

examples.en: The new project is coming along nicely.
examples.cn: 新项目进展顺利。

examples.en: How is your recovery coming along after the surgery?
examples.cn: 手术后你的恢复情况如何？

examples.en: A great opportunity came along, and she took it.
examples.cn: 一个绝佳的机会出现了，她抓住了它。

examples.en: If a better job comes along, I might consider switching.
examples.cn: 如果有更好的工作出现，我可能会考虑换工作。

examples.en: Can you keep a secret? I'm planning a surprise party.
examples.cn: 你能保守秘密吗？我在计划一个惊喜派对。

examples.en: She promised to keep the secret about the company merger.
examples.cn: 她承诺保守公司合并的秘密。

examples.en: Once again, he forgot to lock the door when leaving.
examples.cn: 他又一次忘记锁门就离开了。

examples.en: The team won the championship once again this year.
examples.cn: 该队今年再次赢得了冠军。

examples.en: The company tried to play down the significance of the data breach.
examples.cn: 公司试图淡化数据泄露的重要性。

examples.en: He played down his role in the project's success.
examples.cn: 他轻描淡写了自己在项目成功中的作用。

examples.en: The manager made the decision on the spot without consulting anyone.
examples.cn: 经理当场做出了决定，没有咨询任何人。

examples.en: She was hired on the spot after the interview.
examples.cn: 面试后她当场被录用了。

examples.en: Reporters were on the spot to cover the breaking news.
examples.cn: 记者在现场报道突发新闻。

examples.en: Emergency services arrived on the spot within minutes.
examples.cn: 紧急服务在几分钟内到达了现场。

examples.en: Carbon is a basic element in organic chemistry.
examples.cn: 碳是有机化学中的基本元素。

examples.en: Trust is a basic element of any strong relationship.
examples.cn: 信任是任何牢固关系的基本元素。

examples.en: Take Japan for instance, it has a very efficient public transportation system.
examples.cn: 以日本为例，它拥有非常高效的公共交通系统。

examples.en: Take this case for instance, it illustrates the importance of cybersecurity.
examples.cn: 以这个案例为例，它说明了网络安全的重要性。

examples.en: The doctor took a blood sample to check for infections.
examples.cn: 医生取了血液样本来检查感染。

examples.en: A blood sample is required for the genetic testing.
examples.cn: 基因检测需要血液样本。

examples.en: Citizens are urged to evacuate due to the approaching hurricane.
examples.cn: 由于飓风临近，市民被敦促撤离。

examples.en: Employees are urged to complete the training by the end of the week.
examples.cn: 员工被敦促在本周末前完成培训。

examples.en: He has a thirst for knowledge and reads constantly.
examples.cn: 他渴望知识，不断阅读。

examples.en: The team has a thirst for victory after last season's loss.
examples.cn: 在上赛季失利后，该队渴望胜利。

examples.en: She had to let go of the rope to avoid falling.
examples.cn: 她不得不放开绳子以避免摔倒。

examples.en: It's time to let go of past grudges and move on.
examples.cn: 是时候放下过去的怨恨，继续前进了。

examples.en: Our company plans to link up with a tech startup for innovation.
examples.cn: 我们公司计划与一家科技初创公司联合进行创新。

examples.en: The two highways link up with each other at the interchange.
examples.cn: 两条高速公路在立交桥处相互连接。

examples.en: After the long flight, he needed to sleep off the jet lag.
examples.cn: 长途飞行后，他需要通过睡觉来倒时差。

examples.en: She decided to sleep off her headache instead of taking medicine.
examples.cn: 她决定通过睡觉来缓解头痛，而不是吃药。

examples.en: Keep an eye out for any suspicious activity in the neighborhood.
examples.cn: 留意社区内任何可疑活动。

examples.en: I'll keep an eye out for your package and let you know when it arrives.
examples.cn: 我会留意你的包裹，到达时通知你。

examples.en: With three young children, she always has her hands full.
examples.cn: 有三个年幼的孩子，她总是忙得不可开交。

examples.en: During the holiday season, retail workers have their hands full with customers.
examples.cn: 假日季节期间，零售员工因顾客而忙得不可开交。

examples.en: The sudden news took me aback.
examples.cn: 突如其来的消息让我大吃一惊。

examples.en: Her harsh words took everyone aback at the meeting.
examples.cn: 她尖刻的言辞让会议上所有人都震惊了。

definitions.meaning_cn: 严格按照字面意思，丝毫不差

examples.en: Follow the recipe to the letter for best results.
examples.cn: 严格按照食谱操作以获得最佳效果。

examples.en: He executed the plan to the letter, leaving no room for error.
examples.cn: 他一丝不苟地执行了计划，没有留下任何错误的空间。

examples.en: Her promotion made her the target of envy among her colleagues.
examples.cn: 她的晋升使她成为同事们嫉妒的对象。

examples.en: His luxurious lifestyle is a target of envy for many.
examples.cn: 他奢华的生活方式是许多人嫉妒的对象。

examples.en: You are supposed to submit the report by Friday.
examples.cn: 你应该在周五前提交报告。

examples.en: He was supposed to call me yesterday, but he forgot.
examples.cn: 他昨天应该给我打电话的，但他忘了。

definitions.meaning_cn: 艰难地完成，费力地处理

examples.en: We had to slog through hundreds of pages of documentation.
examples.cn: 我们不得不费力地处理数百页的文档。

examples.en: She slogged through the muddy trail to reach the summit.
examples.cn: 她艰难地穿过泥泞的小径到达山顶。

examples.en: This is the same book that I read last year.
examples.cn: 这就是我去年读的那本书。

examples.en: He lives in the same city that I grew up in.
examples.cn: 他住在我长大的那个城市。

examples.en: All things considered, it was a successful event.
examples.cn: 总的来说，这是一次成功的活动。

examples.en: All things considered, I think we should accept the offer.
examples.cn: 综合考虑，我认为我们应该接受这个提议。

examples.en: The new policy gave rise to widespread protests.
examples.cn: 新政策引起了广泛的抗议。

examples.en: Poor communication can give rise to misunderstandings.
examples.cn: 沟通不畅可能导致误解。

examples.en: Traveling abroad can help broaden your horizons.
examples.cn: 出国旅行有助于开阔你的眼界。

examples.en: Reading diverse books broadens one's horizons.
examples.cn: 阅读多样化的书籍可以增长见识。

examples.en: She's as tough as nails and never gives up.
examples.cn: 她非常坚强，从不放弃。

examples.en: The old soldier was as tough as nails, surviving many hardships.
examples.cn: 那位老兵坚韧不拔，经历了许多艰难困苦。

examples.en: We plant trees every spring to help the environment.
examples.cn: 我们每年春天植树以帮助环境。

examples.en: The community organized an event to plant trees in the park.
examples.cn: 社区组织了一次在公园植树的活动。

examples.en: The positive and negative charges cancel each other out.
examples.cn: 正负电荷相互抵消。

examples.en: His good deeds cancel out his past mistakes.
examples.cn: 他的善行抵消了他过去的错误。

valid_entries.original_phrase: have one's heart miss a beat

definitions.meaning_cn: 心跳漏了一拍，形容惊讶或紧张

examples.en: When I saw the surprise, my heart missed a beat.
examples.cn: 当我看到惊喜时，我的心跳漏了一拍。

examples.en: Her sudden appearance made his heart miss a beat.
examples.cn: 她的突然出现让他的心漏跳了一拍。

examples.en: This rule is true of all employees.
examples.cn: 这条规则适用于所有员工。

examples.en: What is true of one case may not be true of another.
examples.cn: 适用于一种情况的可能不适用于另一种。

examples.en: The project is going great guns and should finish on time.
examples.cn: 项目进展迅速，应该能按时完成。

examples.en: After the initial delay, the team went great guns to catch up.
examples.cn: 在最初的延迟之后，团队全力以赴赶上了进度。

examples.en: The discussion centred on the new policy changes.
examples.cn: 讨论聚焦于新的政策变化。

examples.en: Her research centres on environmental sustainability.
examples.cn: 她的研究以环境可持续性为中心。

examples.en: They fought for their rights in the court.
examples.cn: 他们在法庭上为自己的权利而战。

examples.en: She fights for equality in the workplace.
examples.cn: 她为工作场所的平等而奋斗。

examples.en: The situation is improving by the day.
examples.cn: 情况一天天在改善。

examples.en: Her health is deteriorating by the day.
examples.cn: 她的健康状况逐日恶化。

examples.en: She prefers to work by herself in the quiet office.
examples.cn: 她更喜欢在安静的办公室里独自工作。

examples.en: He learned to cook by himself through online tutorials.
examples.cn: 他通过在线教程自学烹饪。

examples.en: Animal experiments are conducted to test the safety of new drugs.
examples.cn: 进行动物实验是为了测试新药的安全性。

examples.en: The university has strict ethical guidelines for animal experiments.
examples.cn: 这所大学对动物实验有严格的伦理准则。

examples.en: He tried to get round the rules by finding a loophole.
examples.cn: 他试图通过寻找漏洞来规避规则。

examples.en: We can get round the traffic by taking the back roads.
examples.cn: 我们可以走小路来避开交通拥堵。

examples.en: She managed to get round her parents to let her go to the party.
examples.cn: 她设法说服了父母让她去参加派对。

examples.en: He always gets round his boss with flattery.
examples.cn: 他总是用奉承来哄骗他的老板。

examples.en: If you don't wear a helmet, you run a risk of serious injury.
examples.cn: 如果你不戴头盔，就有严重受伤的风险。

examples.en: Investing in startups runs a risk of losing money.
examples.cn: 投资初创公司有亏钱的风险。

examples.en: Her beauty was beyond expression, leaving everyone speechless.
examples.cn: 她的美难以言表，让所有人都哑口无言。

examples.en: The joy he felt at the news was beyond expression.
examples.cn: 他听到这个消息时的喜悦无法形容。

examples.en: She portioned out the cake equally among the children.
examples.cn: 她把蛋糕平均分配给了孩子们。

examples.en: We need to portion out the supplies for the week.
examples.cn: 我们需要把这周的物资分配好。

examples.en: She gets along well with her colleagues at work.
examples.cn: 她和同事在工作中相处得很好。

examples.en: It's important to get along with your neighbors.
examples.cn: 与邻居相处融洽很重要。

examples.en: How are you getting along with your new project?
examples.cn: 你的新项目进展如何？

examples.en: He's getting along fine in his new school.
examples.cn: 他在新学校进行得很顺利。

examples.en: I enjoy outdoor activities, such as hiking and cycling.
examples.cn: 我喜欢户外活动，比如徒步和骑自行车。

examples.en: Many fruits, such as apples and oranges, are rich in vitamin C.
examples.cn: 许多水果，例如苹果和橙子，富含维生素C。

examples.en: Good city planning can reduce traffic congestion.
examples.cn: 良好的城市规划可以减少交通拥堵。

examples.en: She studied city planning at university.
examples.cn: 她在大学学习了城市规划。

examples.en: We took a non-stop flight from New York to London.
examples.cn: 我们乘坐了从纽约到伦敦的直飞航班。

examples.en: Non-stop flights are more convenient but often more expensive.
examples.cn: 直飞航班更方便，但通常更贵。

valid_entries.original_phrase: put one's nose out of joint

examples.en: Her promotion really put his nose out of joint.
examples.cn: 她的晋升真的让他很恼火。

examples.en: Winning the award put a few noses out of joint among the competitors.
examples.cn: 赢得这个奖项让一些竞争者感到嫉妒。

examples.en: During the shortage, fresh water was sold at a premium.
examples.cn: 短缺期间，淡水以高价出售。

examples.en: Parking spaces in the city center are at a premium.
examples.cn: 市中心的停车位非常稀缺。

examples.en: In this company, honesty is held at a premium.
examples.cn: 在这家公司，诚实受到高度重视。

examples.en: Time is at a premium when you have a tight deadline.
examples.cn: 当截止日期紧迫时，时间非常宝贵。

examples.en: She went out of her way to help me move house.
examples.cn: 她特意来帮我搬家。

examples.en: He went out of his way to make the guests feel welcome.
examples.cn: 他不辞辛劳地让客人们感到受欢迎。

definitions.meaning_cn: 微小的机会，渺茫的希望

examples.en: There's only a faint chance that it will rain tomorrow.
examples.cn: 明天下雨的机会很渺茫。

examples.en: He has a faint chance of winning the competition.
examples.cn: 他赢得比赛的机会很小。

definitions.meaning_cn: 详尽讨论，穷尽一个话题

examples.en: The professor exhausted the subject in his three-hour lecture.
examples.cn: 教授在三小时的讲座中详尽讨论了这个话题。

examples.en: We've exhausted this subject; let's move on to the next one.
examples.cn: 我们已经穷尽了这个话题，让我们继续下一个。

examples.en: He's trying for a promotion at work.
examples.cn: 他正在工作中争取晋升。

examples.en: She decided to try for a scholarship to study abroad.
examples.cn: 她决定争取奖学金出国留学。

examples.en: I'll try for a better score on the next test.
examples.cn: 我会在下次考试中尝试取得更好的分数。

examples.en: They're trying for a baby after years of marriage.
examples.cn: 结婚多年后，他们正在尝试要孩子。

valid_entries.original_phrase: do an about face on sth.

examples.en: The company did an about face on its environmental policy after public pressure.
examples.cn: 在公众压力下，这家公司彻底改变了其环境政策。

examples.en: He did an about face on his decision to quit his job.
examples.cn: 他彻底改变了辞职的决定。

examples.en: Mathematics and history are different areas of knowledge.
examples.cn: 数学和历史是不同的知识领域。

examples.en: The course covers various areas of knowledge in science.
examples.cn: 这门课程涵盖了科学中的多个知识领域。

valid_entries.original_phrase: take sth. with a grain of salt

definitions.meaning_cn: 对某事持保留态度，半信半疑

examples.en: You should take his advice with a grain of salt; he's not an expert.
examples.cn: 你应该对他的建议持保留态度，他不是专家。

examples.en: I take rumors with a grain of salt until I see evidence.
examples.cn: 我对谣言半信半疑，直到看到证据。

examples.en: Are you hungry? Not really, I just ate.
examples.cn: 你饿吗？不太饿，我刚吃过。

examples.en: Do you like the movie? Not really, it was too slow.
examples.cn: 你喜欢这部电影吗？不完全是，它太慢了。

examples.en: She always stands up for her friends when they're being bullied.
examples.cn: 当她的朋友被欺负时，她总是站出来维护他们。

examples.en: We must stand up for our rights in this negotiation.
examples.cn: 在这次谈判中，我们必须维护自己的权利。

examples.en: He stood up for his principles even when it was unpopular.
examples.cn: 即使不受欢迎，他也坚持自己的原则。

examples.en: It's important to stand up for what you believe in.
examples.cn: 坚持自己的信念很重要。

examples.en: The poem was written in praise of nature's beauty.
examples.cn: 这首诗是为了歌颂大自然的美丽而写的。

examples.en: He spoke in praise of her dedication to the project.
examples.cn: 他发言赞扬了她对项目的奉献精神。

examples.en: Crime rates are on the increase in some urban areas.
examples.cn: 一些城市地区的犯罪率正在上升。

examples.en: Demand for renewable energy is on the increase globally.
examples.cn: 全球对可再生能源的需求正在增加。

definitions.meaning_cn: 育儿技能，抚养孩子的能力

examples.en: Good parenting skills include patience and effective communication.
examples.cn: 良好的育儿技能包括耐心和有效的沟通。

examples.en: She attended a workshop to improve her parenting skills.
examples.cn: 她参加了一个研讨会来提高她的育儿技能。

examples.en: I usually punch out at 5 PM after finishing my tasks.
examples.cn: 我通常在完成任务后下午5点打卡下班。

examples.en: Don't forget to punch out before you leave the office.
examples.cn: 离开办公室前别忘了打卡下班。

examples.en: The boxer managed to punch out his opponent in the third round.
examples.cn: 这位拳击手在第三回合击倒了对手。

examples.en: He punched out the attacker with a single blow.
examples.cn: 他一拳击倒了袭击者。

examples.en: Don't get worked up over such a small mistake.
examples.cn: 别为这么小的错误生气。

examples.en: She got worked up over the upcoming exam.
examples.cn: 她对即将到来的考试感到非常激动。

examples.en: The lecture touched upon several key issues in economics.
examples.cn: 这次讲座涉及了经济学中的几个关键问题。

examples.en: He only touched upon the topic briefly during the meeting.
examples.cn: 他在会议上只是简要地提及了这个话题。

examples.en: The new regulations could choke off innovation in the industry.
examples.cn: 新规定可能会抑制该行业的创新。

examples.en: High interest rates are choking off consumer spending.
examples.cn: 高利率正在抑制消费者支出。

examples.en: The dust choked off the air supply in the tunnel.
examples.cn: 灰尘使隧道中的空气供应停止了。

examples.en: She choked off a sob before speaking.
examples.cn: 她在说话前抑制住了抽泣。

definitions.meaning_cn: 买断某人的股份或权益

examples.en: The company decided to buy out its minority shareholders.
examples.cn: 公司决定买断少数股东的股份。

examples.en: He was bought out of the partnership for a large sum.
examples.cn: 他被用一大笔钱买断了合伙权益。

examples.en: Generally speaking, exercise is good for your health.
examples.cn: 一般来说，锻炼对健康有益。

examples.en: Generally speaking, the project was a success.
examples.cn: 总体而言，这个项目是成功的。

examples.en: It took him a while to get up enough nerve to ask her out.
examples.cn: 他花了一段时间才鼓起足够的勇气约她出去。

examples.en: She finally got up enough nerve to speak in public.
examples.cn: 她终于鼓起足够的勇气在公众场合发言。

examples.en: He drove the joke into the ground by repeating it too many times.
examples.cn: 他重复太多次，把这个笑话讲烂了。

examples.en: Poor management drove the company into the ground.
examples.cn: 糟糕的管理把公司搞垮了。

examples.en: We need to sort out these files before the audit.
examples.cn: 我们需要在审计前整理好这些文件。

examples.en: They sorted out their differences after a long discussion.
examples.cn: 经过长时间讨论，他们解决了分歧。

examples.en: Can you help me sort out the recyclables from the trash?
examples.cn: 你能帮我从垃圾中分出可回收物吗？

examples.en: She sorted out the clothes by color.
examples.cn: 她按颜色分类了衣服。

examples.en: Better times are just round the corner.
examples.cn: 更好的时光即将到来。

examples.en: There's a grocery store round the corner from here.
examples.cn: 从这里拐角处有一家杂货店。

examples.en: The children reside with their mother after the divorce.
examples.cn: 离婚后，孩子们与母亲同住。

examples.en: He currently resides with his grandparents.
examples.cn: 他目前与祖父母同住。

definitions.meaning_cn: 存在于，属于（责任或权力）

examples.en: The final decision resides with the board of directors.
examples.cn: 最终决定权属于董事会。

examples.en: Authority in this matter resides with the government.
examples.cn: 这件事的权力属于政府。

examples.en: Please turn the page over to continue reading.
examples.cn: 请翻到下一页继续阅读。

examples.en: He turned over the documents to the police.
examples.cn: 他把文件移交给了警方。

examples.en: The company turns over millions of dollars each year.
examples.cn: 这家公司每年的营业额达到数百万美元。

examples.en: They aim to turn over a profit by the end of the quarter.
examples.cn: 他们的目标是在本季度末实现盈利。

examples.en: The oppressive regime held down any form of dissent.
examples.cn: 压迫性政权压制了任何形式的异议。

examples.en: High costs are holding down consumer spending.
examples.cn: 高成本限制了消费者支出。

examples.en: The central bank is trying to hold down inflation.
examples.cn: 中央银行正试图抑制通货膨胀。

examples.en: They held down prices during the sale.
examples.cn: 他们在促销期间保持了低价。

examples.en: Their opinions are similar on this issue.
examples.cn: 他们在这个问题上的意见相似。

examples.en: The two designs are very similar in appearance.
examples.cn: 这两种设计在外观上非常相似。

examples.en: The apartment is furnished with modern appliances.
examples.cn: 这套公寓配备有现代电器。

examples.en: The room was furnished with antique furniture.
examples.cn: 这个房间装饰有古董家具。

examples.en: The report is furnished with detailed statistics.
examples.cn: 这份报告提供了详细的统计数据。

examples.en: He was furnished with all the necessary tools for the job.
examples.cn: 他获得了这项工作所需的所有必要工具。

examples.en: She tried to keep from laughing during the serious meeting.
examples.cn: 在严肃的会议上，她努力忍住不笑。

examples.en: He kept from eating junk food to improve his health.
examples.cn: 他避免吃垃圾食品以改善健康。

examples.en: They kept the surprise party from her until the last moment.
examples.cn: 他们对她隐瞒了惊喜派对，直到最后一刻。

examples.en: He kept the bad news from his family to spare them worry.
examples.cn: 他向家人隐瞒了坏消息，以免他们担心。

examples.en: The fence keeps the children from wandering into the street.
examples.cn: 栅栏防止孩子们跑到街上去。

examples.en: Wearing sunscreen keeps your skin from getting sunburned.
examples.cn: 涂防晒霜可以保护皮肤不被晒伤。

examples.en: After the concert, we made our way to the nearest restaurant.
examples.cn: 音乐会结束后，我们前往最近的餐厅。

examples.en: She made her way to the airport despite the heavy traffic.
examples.cn: 尽管交通拥堵，她还是设法赶到了机场。

examples.en: He made his way to the top of the company through hard work.
examples.cn: 通过努力工作，他晋升到了公司的最高层。

examples.en: The small startup made its way to success in a competitive market.
examples.cn: 这家小初创公司在竞争激烈的市场中取得了成功。

examples.en: The hikers made their way to the summit through thick fog.
examples.cn: 徒步旅行者在浓雾中缓慢地向山顶前进。

examples.en: The injured animal made its way to safety in the forest.
examples.cn: 受伤的动物艰难地移动到森林中的安全地带。
